channel.title: Neverwinter Nights (2)
channel.description: Well these two games are getting on now but the first one is an epic RPG game it is seriously one of the best. One of the nest things is the toolkit that comes with it, that allows you to make your own worlds and then play online. This seriously is an epic game i would recommend you all to try it out [img]http://www.bastionsofwar.com/screenshots/bobofett77/nwn1.jpg[/img] quick screenshot of the first that i nabbed from google, as you tell the graphics are a bit dated but dont let that put you off its still a fucking good game Now the second one, alot of hardcore neverwinter fans disagree and say that this is a bad game i however think it is pretty good, ive just been playing it recently and the gameplay is just as good even if the layout has changed drastically. It comes with the same toolkit soy uo can make worlds,quests etc yourself and this is the beauty of these games, that you can make your world whatver you want it to be and play online and my god is it good! [img]http://www.chrisholmesonline.com/images/nwn2.jpg[/img] this is the second one right now im not sure about america but UK users can get the first game and its expansions for £10 from popular places like game.co.uk and play.com the second one and its expansion packs is a bit more

item.title: Neverwinter Nights (2)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:5, topic:290390”]I have an un-opened copy of Neverwinter Nights 2.

I might try it some day, when I stop being lazy.[/quote]

I had nwn under my bed for like a year, then I played it for 25 mins and thought it was terrible, then another year later I tried it and it was all I played for like a week.

Read full topic

item.title: Neverwinter Nights (2)
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:290390”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=383898.msg2883223#msg2883223 date=1248451645]
pro tip its ad&d but on a pc
[/quote]

What is that? I googled and wikipedia said it might mean “Accidental death and dismemberment insurance”, then, after I stopped laughing I figured I would ask.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AD&D

I guess you probably mean “Advanced Dungeons & Dragons role-playing game”[/quote]
yeah it does mean advancded D&D rpg however your definition mande me laugh

Read full topic

item.title: Neverwinter Nights (2)
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Yeah, it’s basically Advanced Dungeons and Dragons 3 or 3.5, can’t remember which, friend who plays was telling me about it. I found this really nice online server for it a while ago, but lost it, and never got around to downloading the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Neverwinter Nights (2)

@sanga282 wrote:

Well these two games are getting on now but the first one is an epic RPG game it is seriously one of the best. One of the nest things is the toolkit that comes with it, that allows you to make your own worlds and then play online. This seriously is an epic game i would recommend you all to try it out

quick screenshot of the first that i nabbed from google, as you tell the graphics are a bit dated but dont let that put you off its still a fucking good game
Now the second one, alot of hardcore neverwinter fans disagree and say that this is a bad game i however think it is pretty good, ive just been playing it recently and the gameplay is just as good even if the layout has changed drastically. It comes with the same toolkit soy uo can make worlds,quests etc yourself and this is the beauty of these games, that you can make your world whatver you want it to be and play online and my god is it good!

this is the second one
right now im not sure about america but UK users can get the first game and its expansions for £10 from popular places like game.co.uk and play.com the second one and its expansion packs is a bit more
